actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE DISTRIBUTION_DATA_APPLICATION.TM_API_CAMPAIGNAUTOMATION SET
		CAMPAIGNID = '{{update_form.fieldState.CAMPAIGNID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CAMPAIGNID : update_form.sourceData.CAMPAIGNID}}',
		SFTPPASSWORD = '{{update_form.fieldState.SFTPPASSWORD.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SFTPPASSWORD : update_form.sourceData.SFTPPASSWORD}}',
    URLCUSTOMER = '{{update_form.fieldState.URLCUSTOMER.isVisible ? update_form.formData.URLCUSTOMER : update_form.sourceData.URLCUSTOMER}}',
		XAUTHORIZATION = '{{update_form.fieldState.XAUTHORIZATION.isVisible ? update_form.formData.XAUTHORIZATION : update_form.sourceData.XAUTHORIZATION}}',
		SFTPEXCELSHEETNAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.SFTPEXCELSHEETNAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SFTPEXCELSHEETNAME : update_form.sourceData.SFTPEXCELSHEETNAME}}',
		VIEWCONNEX = '{{update_form.fieldState.VIEWCONNEX.isVisible ? update_form.formData.VIEWCONNEX : update_form.sourceData.VIEWCONNEX}}',
		SFTPHOST = '{{update_form.fieldState.SFTPHOST.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SFTPHOST : update_form.sourceData.SFTPHOST}}',
		SPSNOWFLAKE = '{{update_form.fieldState.SPSNOWFLAKE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SPSNOWFLAKE : update_form.sourceData.SPSNOWFLAKE}}',
		SFTPSEPERATOR = '{{update_form.fieldState.SFTPSEPERATOR.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SFTPSEPERATOR : update_form.sourceData.SFTPSEPERATOR}}',
		URLTOKEN = '{{update_form.fieldState.URLTOKEN.isVisible ? update_form.formData.URLTOKEN : update_form.sourceData.URLTOKEN}}',
		CONNEXDATA = '{{update_form.fieldState.CONNEXDATA.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CONNEXDATA : update_form.sourceData.CONNEXDATA}}'
  WHERE VIEWSILVERSURFER = {{data_table.selectedRow.VIEWSILVERSURFER}};
